org.javasimon

Interface SimonFilter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimonPattern

    public interface SimonFilter
    Generic filter useful whenever Simons are filtered for some operation.
    Author:
    Ivan Mushketyk

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static SimonFilter ACCEPT_ALL_FILTER
      Filter accepting all Simons.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean accept(Simon simon)
      Checks whether current Simon should be used/considered.

    • Field Detail

      • ACCEPT_ALL_FILTER

        static final SimonFilter ACCEPT_ALL_FILTER
        Filter accepting all Simons.

    • Method Detail

      • accept

        boolean accept(Simon simon)
        Checks whether current Simon should be used/considered.
        Parameters:
        simon - Simon to check
        Returns:
        true if current Simon should be used, false otherwise
